title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page
author: oeyoews
name: Tiddlywiki Static Page
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/readme","text":"
此插件不建议普通tiddlywiki用户使用
!! Tutorials * Coming * Tiddlywiki Static Page * [[Source|https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw/tree/main/dev/plugins/tiddlywiki-static-page]] * [[Demo|https://oeyoews.github.io/neotw/main]] "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/config":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/config"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/icon","text":" "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/macro/static-link":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/macro/static-link","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":"\define static-link() \end "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/ui/new-page":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/ui/new-page","tags":"$:/tags/ViewToolbar","description":"new-page","caption":"new-page","list-before":"$:/core/ui/Buttons/close","text":"\whitespace trim <$list filter="[all[current]!is[system]]"> <$button tooltip="jump new-page and copy url" aria-label="new-page" class=<>> <$list filter="[{$:/info/url/protocol}prefix[https]]"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" $param={{{ [[$:/info/url/full]get[text]search-replace:g:regexp[index.html|index|main.html|main|],[]addsuffix[static/]] [[]addsuffixencodeuricomponent[]] +[join[]] }}}/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-open-external-window" $param={{{ [[$:/info/url/full]get[text]search-replace:g:regexp[index.html|index|main.html|main|],[]addsuffix[static/]] [[]addsuffixencodeuricomponent[]] +[join[]] }}}/> <$list filter="[{$:/info/url/protocol}prefix[http]]"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" $param={{{ [[$:/info/url/full]get[text]] [[]addsuffixencodeuricomponent[]] +[join[]] }}}/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-open-external-window" $param={{{ [[$:/info/url/full]get[text]] [[]addsuffixencodeuricomponent[]] +[join[]] }}}/> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-static-page/icon}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="new-page"/> "}}}
